breakfast.description: 4-egg omelette (minimal yolks, zero oil) + black coffee

postWorkoutShake.description: 2 scoops whey isolate + 5 g creatine (in pre-workout drink)

lunch.description: 300 g grilled Norwegian/Atlantic salmon + green veggies (minimal oil)

dinner.description: 2 whole grilled crabs (≈330 g edible meat) + 300 g grilled Pandugappa (Black Pomfret) – zero oil/butter, just salt & spices

training: Heavy chest day – bench, incline, flies, cable work. Volume PR. Pump insane.
notes: Peak Dixit shredded mode. 290 g protein on <20 g carbs and only 39 g fat. Zero junk, zero added oil anywhere. Fasted weight dropping fast while strength is flying. Seafood demolished: 630 g edible portion at dinner alone. Streak continues.
